Test unittest environment for pynoddyÂ¶

import unittest

def fun(x):
    return x + 1

class MyTest(unittest.TestCase):
    def test(self):
        self.assertEqual(fun(3), 4)

def square(x):
    """Squares x.

    >>> square(2)
    4
    >>> square(-2)
    4
    """

    return x * x

import doctest
doctest.testmod()

TestResults(failed=0, attempted=2)
